issue.title: [CF 57] Increase the number of conditions to 4+
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

To add more conditions than 3.

Please provide any additional information below.

Thanks for updating my favorite addon! With the conditions, it can actually compete with Power Auras, which used to be monopolist in complex conditions. The problem is, with my Mage I ran out of space conditions-wise.

I wanted to Deep Freeze to show when:
Frost Nova is present on target OR
Freeze is present on target OR
Improved Cone of Cold is present on target OR
Fingers of Frost is present on player.

this is 4 conditions, so it can't be executed. Of course there are ways around it, but I'm sure I'm not the only one who would like more than 3 conditions.

Keep up the good work!


> Posted by CurseForge user f1reburn | Imported from CurseForge issue #57 | Raw

comments.body:
